alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 9:03PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rush and southwestern Ellis Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 903 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Antonino, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Antonino around 910 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Schoenchen and Liebenthal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Kansas.
